section.title: Definitions
section.para: The following terms are used in this book:

glossdef.para: An application is a computer program which is designed to perform a group of actions on a project.
A project is an item of work.
The item of work can be data. that the user creates, edits or views, or it can be a task that the user performs.
An application which supports projects which have a document as its work item. Such as text documents and drawing documents.
A drawing is a set of graphical elements painted on a canvas.
A figure is a graphical element of a drawing.
Depending on the use case, a figure may represent a graphical primitive, such as a line or a rectangle, or it may represent a concept, for example a person in an organization diagram.
